content.query:
--- Create the view
CREATE OR ALTER VIEW [table_schema].[bi_test]
AS
SELECT DISTINCT Resourcegroup
FROM [table_schema].[activity_log]
WHERE Resourcegroup IS NOT NULL;

--- View the view
SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'table_schema' AND TABLE_NAME = 'bi_test';

--- Check the view
SELECT * FROM AppleMusicDW.table_schema.bi_test;
pow
